Comments
December 14, 2021
jcintro
This version of Carol will be a fantastic pull in sealed. Top dial Outwit is nothing to sneeze at, and her attack special is very potent. I like this fig, she may end up finding her way on to a Kree team or two at some point.
December 13, 2021
pokolo
Cosmic Energy figures always seem slightly over costed because the TA adds a lot of their point cost… however for 20 points more I still like CAAV Carol more than this … still this isn’t bad though and will definitely play well in sealed
December 8, 2021
The Singularity
I agree with you goop, but in sealed this can be a decent tentpole. Top dial RS, PPB, IMP, and OWT is the coveted combo in these days of nerfed Pulse Wave.
November 30, 2021
Goop
Its nice that EE and Psyblast work together now but still for 130 she feels pretty overcosted. I like the 7 range and outwit but still it would be tough to take her over the Super Rare one from CAAV set that offers so much more. She is a common with Cosmic Energy which you dont see often but still, i'm just not seeing the value.
